text_logic_form: The lengths of the lines $JM$ and $PM$ are equal to the length of the line $P$ to $M$.
The lengths of the lines $LM$ and $PM$ are equal to the length of the line $P$ to $L$.
The measure of angle $PLJ$ is $58$ degrees.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The lengths of the lines $JM$ and $PM$ are equal to the length of the line $P$ to $M$.
The lengths of the lines $LM$ and $PM$ are equal to the length of the line $P$ to $L$.
The measure of angle $PLJ$ is $58$ degrees.
diagram_logic_form: Point $M$ lies on the line connecting $L$ and $J$.
